title: Experiential Leadership Education for Strengthening Science-Based Entrepreneurial Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education using VR simulations and mobile apps in a limited technological environment focused on smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can develop science and technology-based business models in VR simulation environments.
Learners can resolve legal/management issues arising during the entrepreneurial process through team projects.
Learners can analyze real-world startup scenarios and develop action plans based on experiential learning activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
